value:
Ladies to my right or to my left, as far
as the eye can see! What heaven is
this I've been summoned to?

If you've been looking for a knight
of Caelin with a fiery passion, you've
found your man!

To NOT comment on the beauty
before me would be the gravest
discourtesy... Don't you agree?

Oh, what dazzling visions of beauty!
Will you grace me with your company
and join me in my reverie?

Kent's scowling again... I hope that
doesn't mean trouble. Hm? Oh, just
talking to myself! Never mind me!

Sain, the gallant man of Caelin, stands
before you! All you lonely ladies, get
ready to have your spirit rejuvenated!

This won't be easy, but I won't let
that stop me. After all, why worry?
I'm not alone.

Sain, the gallant man of Caelin.
That's me!

I was too focused on the offensive.
I got careless.

I will show you the true force
a knight of Lycia can be!

You called for THE Sain? Of course
you did! Now, if you wouldn't mind
pointing the way to the ladies...

What a wonderful place you have
here—this Askr, the Order of Heroes!
My envy knows no bounds!$k$pStrong, beautiful women in every
direction... I regret only that I was
not summoned here sooner!$k$pBut I, Sain, will not allow any minor
setback to keep me from my dream!$k$pIt was providence that I met you.
Truly, I believe that! And I have
just the plan for our future...$k$pWhy not put a team together made
exclusively of beautiful ladies?!
Think about it...$k$pWe can call it, I don't know... Oh, how
about $Nu Squad!$k$pGoddesses on guard! Beauties of
the battlefield! We can figure it
out later...$k$pWhat's important is that I'll handle
leading the unit and handpicking
all our special recruits!$k$pI foresee my schedule filling up
rather quickly!
とうっ
決める！
げっ！
外した…！
For the ladies!
Don't be shy.
I'll take care of this!
Your knight and protector, Sain!
I see fields of flowers...
Ugh...
Sain, the gallant man of Caelin. That's me!
Ah! Oh, It's you! Don't scare me like that!
We knights are honor-bound to protect fair maidens.
Lady Lyndis is quite a beauty. I'm blessed to call her my liege.
Kent worries too much. He's going to grow old before his time.
Aah! So many beautiful women, and only one of me!
We were destined to meet here! It's fate!
And I'm off!
Um...
Right, then!
